title: Ask A Farmer | Ep. 2 | Peach Farmer

subtasks: Prune peach trees in January and February
Look for freezes in April, May, June
Thin peach crop in April, May, June
Harvest peaches during July, August
Irrigate peach trees when necessary
Mow around peach trees to control weeds
Check for peach tree borers in the fall
Spray peach trees to protect from insects in the fall
Plant peach pits to grow new trees
Protect peach orchard from deer and squirrels
Apply pesticides to protect peaches from insects in late summer

tasks.task: Describe the ripening and harvest process for peaches
subtasks: Monitor peach development throughout the growing season

Harvest peaches during the optimal ripening period
